reviews.review: I have to say the opening was great and there was a lot of action, comedy and drama. The only thing I don't really like is the ending. It's just so sad. Still a very good movie and it was totally worthy watching it.

The ONLY reason I didn't give this 5 stars (and I've seen it 4 times as of today) is because of the tragic "deaths"/deaths. They needed to happen though, and I LOVE how the Russo brothers bring everything together in a funny, dramatic, and endearing way that still, somehow, leaves us wanting more-even though we all know what they will probably bring us is more heartbreak. The vfx and cinematography are amazing and keep getting better and better in each movie. I love how they put the one post scene at the very end (though we almost didn't get one at all) because the people who do the behind-the-scenes work are why we even have these movies look the way they do. It's a great scene as well, so there's that payoff. Go see it and make plans to see it at least twice because there's just too much to take in just to see it once, especially if you're a fan of the comics.
Best Avenger movie by far. Probably the best fight scenes in any marvel movie I ever seen. One of my favorite movies of all time. Non stop action.
not very funny, confusing ending, mostly battles with little dialog.
Love it. A must see movie. A lot of action.

I may have to stop avoiding Reviews & Spoilers for seeing Marvel movies in theaters now. To be continued BS. Wish I'd just waited to see it on Blu-ray. Saw it in a group of 4, and none of us were in a good mood after we left the theater.
Another winner in the Avenger's movie saga.
Great Movie, excited for what is coming next!
Not giving away any spoilers! Dont want to ruin parts for others by commenting. Go see it! :)

So if you're a Super Heros fan and specifically a Marvel Heros fan, you'll like this. Good action and good humor peppered throughout as the movie develops and reveals the plot. I think what holds this back from perfect is, in my opinion, a contrived massive action/battle scene in Wakanda precipitated by an odd love connection. The battle scene is somewhat entertaining though afterall....it's more Superhero action!  The ending will disappoint many and in fact, it's sort of a double ending that being the scene after the credits is troubling. The ending prevents me from giving it a full five stars.
